chapter.title: lo_nibble(), hi_nibble()
chapter.code-block: constexpr uint8_t lo_nibble(uint8_t byte); constexpr uint8_t hi_nibble(uint8_t byte);
chapter.p: Return the value of the low-order/high-order half-byte (tetrad), respectively.

chapter.title: msb_ones(), lsb_ones()
chapter.code-block: template<class T> T lsb_ones(unsigned bits_num); template<class T> T msb_ones(unsigned bits_num);
chapter.p: Return the value of the type T with all least/most significant bits_num bits filled with 1, respectively. All other bits are set to 0.

chapter.code-block: template<class T> T get_lsbs(T v, unsigned bits_num);
chapter.p: Returns bits_num least significant bits of v. In other words, zeroes all but bits_num least significant bits.

chapter.p: The functions perform circular left (rotl) or right (rotr) bitwise shift (rotation).
